name: Bridal Shower Cake
author: Carol
summary: For those of you contemplating making a friend or family member a bridal shower cake, here is a good white cake recipe.
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy
Sift flour with baking powder and salt, and add to creamed mixture alternately with milk
In a large glass or metal mixing bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form
Fold 1/3 of the whites into the batter, then quickly fold in remaining whites until no streaks remain
Bake in preheated oven until cake springs back when lightly touched with a finger and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 25 minutes
Allow to cool in pans for 10 minutes, then invert onto a wire rack to cool completely
Cover with white butter icing, and decorate as desired
